title: Responding to disputes with Stripe
summary:
Learn how to handle card disputes on your online business with Stripe. This video walks through the Disputes workflow in the Stripe Dashboard and explains your response options, as well as best practices for responding manually and using Stripe's AI-powered Smart Disputes for automated response. Get started with Stripe today and simplify your dispute management process.

Chapters:
00:00 Introducing disputes
00:23 Responding to disputes
02:28 Best practices for responding to disputes

Resources: https://docs.stripe.com/disputes/responding

Get started with Stripe: https://stripe.com/register
